reporter_caption.center: ASPROMONTE v. W.C.A.B. (AMES DEPT. STORES), 646 EAL 2005 (Pa. 3-15-2006)

caption.center: ANTHONY ASPROMONTE, Petitioner v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Eastern District.

opinion.posture: No. 646 EAL 2005, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Court.
opinion.opinion_text:
AND NOW, this 15th day of March 2006, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is denied.
Justice BALDWIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
